itunes:title: He’s off the rails - daily grind. Enjoying it
title: He’s off the rails - daily grind. Enjoying it
description:
A friend of mine got a text, saying I’m off the rails and hitting the bottle.

As lance used to say, you want to know what I’m on../ “haha” no wine here mate, just 2-3 hours of aerobic exercise a day

Support the show
